name: 霍弘毅
objective: 本課程精選有關教育與文化之文章，引導學生從閱讀中印證，比較各種文化和教育現象，並鼓勵學生從各種不同角度蒐集資料，俾使課堂討論呈現時代性與多元化的觀點。
schedule: In this class we will read some short works which center on intellectual questions such as: Why does Fiction Exist? What is Language? How do students learn? And so on. Then we’ll learn how to talk about and write about intellectual questions and how to critically examine intellectual work.
scorePolicy:
Grading:  30% Mid-Term Essay 0f 2-3 pages
		70% Final Essay of 5-7 pages
materials: Texts: Handouts posted on web page.
